item.title: Need help with lunar spell
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

hey i’ve tried everything and i cant figure this out. Its really irritating too so if you could help ill be VERY happy. It is a 508 server.

heres the code i have:

[code] if(buttonId == 29) { // Heal other

Player p2 = Engine.players[playerId];

if(p.skillLvl[6] >= 92) { if (Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 565) > 0 && Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 563) > 2 && Engine.playerItems.invItemCount(p, 9075) > 2) {
p.requestAnim(4410, 0);
p.requestGFX(726, 100);

p.appendHit(30, 0);
p2.skillLvl[3] += 30;
p.requestForceChat(“AHH MY BLOOD!”);

Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 565, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 565), 1);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 563, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 563), 3);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 9075, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 9075), 3);
}
else {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You don’t have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
}
else {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You need a magic level of 92 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

           break;[/code]

Obviously it IS inside the case 430 for lunar spells.

when i cast the spell none of that happens. I have no clue y either. Im thinking its something to do with the

Player p2 = Engine.players[playerId];

But i dont know what i would put there instead. In the console it says

“PlayerID 2 - interfaceID 430 - buttonID 29”

I think you need to make the playerid for player p2 be set as the player the spell is cast on but idk how or what i would put there to make that happen.

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE help! thanks very much if you do.

Read full topic
